HexagonMis.fit
    Work Team VR

A technical artists' guild with zazz.

Based in rainy Seattle, Washington, we are an interaction design studio that uses cutting-edge technology to build amazing experiences that astonish and delight. Get at us if you want to collaborate on something dope!

Questions?

We weren't kidding when we said to hit us up!

Project

Mariposa Chandelier

The Mariposa Chandelier attempts to make taking the stairs more appealing than the elevator, promoting health and engaging with its viewers by allowing them to trigger animations and sounds that flow throughout the entire installation.
